definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Single quotation marks must delimit each alias.
sentences.chinese: 必須使用單引號確定每個別名的界限。

sentences.english: If we had another name for this meat, people wouldn't even think twice.
sentences.chinese: 你若問起這種肉的別名，人們想都不想就會脫口而出。

sentences.english: The nickname is from the MormonChurchChurch's symbol for hard work.
sentences.chinese: 這一別名來摩門教會對於辛勞工作的象徵。

sentences.english: Create a remote queue definition to the bridge queue and add an alias.
sentences.chinese: 創建到網橋隊列的遠程隊列定義並添加別名。

sentences.english: Dixie itself is a nickname for the American South.
sentences.chinese: Dixie本身就是美國南部各州的別名。

sentences.english: If you need quotation marks inside the alias, use double quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要在別名中使用引號，那麼可以使用雙引號。

sentences.english: Name your bus and specify the authentication aliases for secure connectivity.
sentences.chinese: 命名總線，併爲安全連接指定身份驗證別名。

sentences.english: However, these conflicts may be retained as aliases for the agreed upon term.
sentences.chinese: 但是，可以作爲公認術語的別名保留這些衝突。

sentences.english: So how did the city get this nickname?
sentences.chinese: 那麼此別名是因何而得呢？

sentences.english: Most often, an alias abbreviates literals.
sentences.chinese: 別名通常只是單純的縮寫。

sentences.english: Re-enter the alias name, omitting the incorrect character.
sentences.chinese: 重新輸入別名並省略不正確字符。

sentences.english: The name of the Ma Ling Mountain House was the inscription by Cai Yuanpei, a great educator and then president of Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 別名“馬嶺山房”是北大校長教育家蔡元培題寫的。

sentences.english: Freedom in this sense is, of course, merely another namefor power or wealth.
sentences.chinese: 這種意義上的自由不啻爲權力與財富之別名。

sentences.english: The new alias now appears in the auto-completion list for commands.
sentences.chinese: 現在，新的別名出現在了命令的自動完成列表中。

sentences.english: Iron-ox is another name for tractor.

definition: scientific name/Latin name (of plant or animal)/(according to an old system of nomenclature) on entering school life, a formal personal name given to new students
Compendium of Medical Herbs 1596, compiled by Li Shizhen 李時珍|李时珍[Li3 Shi2 zhen1]
person (first person, second person etc in grammar)/called/known as
